sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Card, Row, Col, Button, Badge, Alert } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useParams, useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const ExperimentDetail = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [experiment, setExperiment] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); // Demo experiment data const demoExperiments = { 1: { id: 1, title: 'Chemical Reaction Experiment', objective: 'To observe the reaction between sodium bicarbonate and acetic acid and measure the gas production.', hypothesis: 'The reaction will produce carbon dioxide gas and cause the solution to bubble.', materials: '‚Ä¢ Sodium bicarbonate (baking soda)\n‚Ä¢ Acetic acid (vinegar)\n‚Ä¢ Beaker\n‚Ä¢ Measuring cylinder\n‚Ä¢ Stopwatch\n‚Ä¢ Safety goggles', procedure: '1. Put on safety goggles\n2. Measure 50ml of vinegar into a beaker\n3. Add 5g of baking soda\n4. Start the stopwatch\n5. Observe the reaction for 2 minutes\n6. Record observations', observations: '‚Ä¢ Immediate bubbling occurred\n‚Ä¢ Solution became cloudy\n‚Ä¢ Temperature increased slightly\n‚Ä¢ Gas bubbles rose to surface\n‚Ä¢ Reaction slowed after 1 minute', results: 'The reaction produced significant amounts of carbon dioxide gas, causing vigorous bubbling for approximately 1 minute before slowing down.', conclusion: 'The hypothesis was confirmed. The reaction between sodium bicarbonate and acetic acid produces carbon dioxide gas, as evidenced by the bubbling observed.', status: 'COMPLETED', createdAt: '2024-01-15T10:30:00Z', updatedAt: '2024-01-15T12:45:00Z', experimentDate: '2024-01-15T10:30:00Z', userFullName: 'Demo User' }, 2: { id: 2, title: 'Plant Growth Study', objective: 'To study the effect of different light conditions on plant growth over a 2-week period.', hypothesis: 'Plants exposed to more light will grow taller and have more leaves than those in low light conditions.', materials: '‚Ä¢ Bean seeds\n‚Ä¢ Pots with soil\n‚Ä¢ Different light sources\n‚Ä¢ Ruler\n‚Ä¢ Camera for documentation', procedure: '1. Plant bean seeds in separate pots\n2. Place pots in different light conditions\n3. Water daily\n4. Measure growth every 3 days\n5. Document with photos', observations: '‚Ä¢ Seeds germinated after 3 days\n‚Ä¢ Plants in bright light grew faster\n‚Ä¢ Some plants showed yellowing in low light', results: 'Plants in bright light grew an average of 15cm, while those in low light grew only 8cm.', conclusion: 'Light availability significantly affects plant growth rate and overall health.', status: 'IN_PROGRESS', createdAt: '2024-01-20T14:15:00Z', updatedAt: '2024-01-25T16:30:00Z', experimentDate: '2024-01-20T14:15:00Z', userFullName: 'Demo User' }, 3: { id: 3, title: 'Microscope Analysis', objective: 'To examine various cell structures under different magnifications and compare plant and animal cells.', hypothesis: 'Plant cells will have visible cell walls and chloroplasts, while animal cells will not.', materials: '‚Ä¢ Microscope\n‚Ä¢ Prepared slides\n‚Ä¢ Onion skin\n‚Ä¢ Cheek cells\n‚Ä¢ Staining solution', procedure: '1. Prepare onion skin slide\n2. Prepare cheek cell slide\n3. Observe under 10x magnification\n4. Switch to 40x magnification\n5. Record observations', observations: '', results: '', conclusion: '', status: 'DRAFT', createdAt: '2024-01-25T09:45:00Z', updatedAt: '2024-01-25T09:45:00Z', experimentDate: '2024-01-25T09:45:00Z', userFullName: 'Demo User' } }; useEffect(() => { // Simulate loading setTimeout(() => { const demoExperiment = demoExperiments[id]; if (demoExperiment) { setExperiment(demoExperiment); } setLoading(false); }, 500); }, [id]); const handleDelete = () => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this experiment?')) { navigate('/'); } }; const getStatusBadge = (status) => { const variants = { DRAFT: 'secondary', IN_PROGRESS: 'warning', COMPLETED: 'success', SUBMITTED: 'info', APPROVED: 'success', REJECTED: 'danger' }; return {status}; }; if (loading) { return (

Loading experiment...

); } if (!experiment) { return ( Experiment not found ); } return (

üß™ Experiment Details

{experiment.title}

{getStatusBadge(experiment.status)}

Created: {new Date(experiment.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()} {experiment.updatedAt && experiment.updatedAt !== experiment.createdAt && ( Updated: {new Date(experiment.updatedAt).toLocaleDateString()} )}

By: {experiment.userFullName || 'Unknown User'}
Objective

{experiment.objective || 'No objective specified.'}
Hypothesis

{experiment.hypothesis || 'No hypothesis specified.'}
Materials

{experiment.materials || 'No materials specified.'}

Procedure

{experiment.procedure || 'No procedure specified.'}

Observations

{experiment.observations || 'No observations recorded.'}

Results

{experiment.results || 'No results recorded.'}

Conclusion

{experiment.conclusion || 'No conclusion drawn.'}

Experiment Info

Status: {getStatusBadge(experiment.status)}

Created: {new Date(experiment.createdAt).toLocaleString()}

{experiment.experimentDate && (

Experiment Date: {new Date(experiment.experimentDate).toLocaleDateString()}

)}

Author: {experiment.userFullName || 'Unknown'}
Actions
); }; export default ExperimentDetail;
